channel.title: Arm64 on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Arm64 on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: arm64 standard runners are now available in private repositories
item.description:
GitHub now offers Linux and Windows arm64 standard GitHub-hosted runners for private repositories, available on the free tier so you can run arm64 CI workflows across all repositories.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [Launched] Generally Available: Trusted Launch is now supported for Arm64 Marketplace Images
item.description:
Azure Marketplace now offers Arm64 images that support Trusted Launch, enabling customers to run Arm64 virtual machines with Trusted Launch security features. This combines Arm64 cost and performance efficiencies with the integrity and protection benefits of Trusted Launch.

  • Source: Azure Updates
